OUR_STORY.HOW_WE_GOT_CLOSER_BODY: We met at Harvey Mudd College and became friends through InterVarsity.
OUR_STORY.FELL_IN_LOVE_BODY: After some twist and turns, we became a couple â™¥
OUR_STORY.PROPOSAL_BODY: Jon asked Ke to marry him, and Ke said yes!
OUR_STORY.WEDDING_BODY: We invite friends and family to witness the beginning of our marriage.

TRAVEL.VENUE_INFO:
Formal attire, ceremony, dinner and dance to follow. 
 On-site parking is available.
TRAVEL.AIRPORT_INFO: Southern California has many airports but John Wayne - Orange County Airport (SNA) is the easiest for domestic flights and is about 20 miles from The Richard Nixon Library.
TRAVEL.AIRPORT_MORE_INFO: Here are some additional airports in the area:
TRAVEL.ONT: Ontario International Airport/ONT: 30 miles North from the Venue.
TRAVEL.LGB: Long Beach Airport/LGB: 30 miles West from the Venue.
TRAVEL.LAX: Los Angeles International Airport/LAX: 45 miles West from the Venue (traffic might not be the best).
TRAVEL.HOTEL_TITLE: Embassy Suites by Hilton Brea North Orange County
TRAVEL.HOTEL_INFO: is about 5 miles from The Richard Nixon Library. The Link above offers guests a discount off the best available flexible rate. The rate will fluctuate based upon pricing of the hotel at the given time.
TRAVEL.HOTEL_MORE_INFO: Here are some additional hotels in the area:
TRAVEL.MARRIOTT: Fullerton Marriott at California State University
TRAVEL.FAIRFIELD: Fairfield Inn by Marriott Anaheim Hills Orange County
TRAVEL.PLACES_INFO: Southern California is home to many tourist attractions such as museums, beaches, and mountains.
TRAVEL.FOOD_INFO: If you are hungry and are in need of recommendations...

REGISTRY.REGISTRY_TEXT_1: Your presence celebrating with us is the greatest gift we could ask for.
